mysql
Class MySQL

java.lang.Object
  mysql.MySQL

public class MySQL
extends java.lang.Object

MySQL class pack PDO library. You can modify code in MySQL construct() . you can change parameter of DriverManager.getConnection() to the URI connecting to another database machine. MySQL class is a singleton pattern.

Author:
Yu-Sheng Cheng.

public boolean update(java.lang.String table,
                      java.util.List<ReplaceableAttribute> list,
                      java.lang.String where)
update specified "table" with "where" condition.

Parameters:
table - table name
list - bind those column names and it values updated
where - condition of update
Returns:
if no error, return true ; if throw SQLException ,return false;

java.sql.SQLException;
